data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hugo Ricardo Secioso Santos, Ulisses Leite Gomes, Patricia Charvet-Almeida (2004): A new species of whiptail stingray of the genus Dasyatis Rafinesque, 1810 from the Southwestern Atlantic Ocean (Chondrichthyes: Myliobatiformes: Dasyatidae).
